query: Gravel Rocks gravel race North York Moors

videos.title: Gravel Rocks 2025 A Different Kind of Gravel Event 🚴🏕🌳🏔
videos.description:
Two unforgettable days of social riding, racing, and real gravel spirit at the Gravel Rocks event in the stunning North York Moors National Park! Based at the beautiful Duncombe Park near Helmsley, this event had it all - scenic trails, great people, and those unbeatable gravel vibes.
🗓 Friday Night Ride 
A fun 10km evening/night route featuring 2 timed segments, perfect to kick off the weekend with some spirited riding under the stars.
🗓 Saturday Double Loop
- Morning Ride: 55km 890m of mixed terrain and climbing 
- Afternoon Ride: 40km 750m  of mixed terrain and climbing
Together, they included 5 timed segments for those who wanted to push hard while keeping the social vibe alive.

From chilled fire pit hangs to full-gas segments, this weekend truly was "a different kind of gravel event". Whether you're here for the competition or the community, Gravel Rocks brings it all together in one amazing package.

Beautiful trials, friendly faces, good vibes.
This is what gravel riding is all about.

#gravelcycling #GravelRocks#FocalEvents#DuncombePark#NorthYorkMoors#CyclingEvent#DifferentKindOfGravelEvent#

videos.title: Gravel Rocks - A Different Kind Of Gravel Event
videos.description: The first ever crankbrothers Gravel Rocks held in the North York Moors National Park.

videos.title: Great Whyte Creations - Gravel Rocks - My first gravel race!
videos.description:
Gravel Rocks…. A different kind of Gravel race. 

INCLUDES ONE NIGHT STAGE – 10km with 2 timed segments
INCLUDES SATURDAY STAGE – 45-80km, mixed trails with 5 timed segments

Event info and 2025 entry: https://gravelrocks.cc

This was my first of many more gravel races. I thoroughly enjoyed the event despite the weather and challenging conditions. The organisers put on a great event, with some amazing trails and scenery. If you haven’t explored North York Moors then you need to! It was so varied there was something for everyone. Safe to say I was sold and I’ll be back next year! Thank you for having us Gravel Rocks 24 🙌🏼

Also, big thanks to Extrauk and Crankbrothers for the support over the weekend 🙏

videos.title: Glorious Gravel North York Moors
videos.description:
50 miles gravel Sportive in Gods Own Country. Nearly didnt go due to illness and it was 30c but a cracking ride on a none-technical route with cracking views.

Music (c) Bensounds

videos.title: Top Of The Rock 2021 gravel blast on SRAM XPLR
videos.description:
The awesome North Yorks Moors trails of the Sutton Bank Bikes Top Of The Rock gravel event were the perfect proving ground for SRAM's full RockShox and Zipp XPLR group. Get on board for the highlights of 83km stunning scenery and the last sand and sun of summer.
Massive thanks to SRAM for the Santa Cruz Stigmata test bike and the full XPLR kit, to Cathy, Adrian, Sophie and the team at Sutton Bank bikes, all the marshals and people I met on the day for making it an absolutely awesome day out.
Thanks to Giro Cycling UK, Peaty's Products and Crud for channel sponsorship and and for my Patreon supporters for their monthly pledges.  If you like what I'm doing and want early, extended and exclusive edits, personal buying and tech advice and other Patreon perks click on the link here: https://www.patreon.com/GuyKesTV?fan_landing=true

Any questions get busy in the comments but don't forget to put this event in your diary for 2022.

Cheers 

Guy
